title: Design and prototype solutions
description: Our certified Salesforce developers design and prototype solutions on the Salesforce platform using Apex programming language, and Salesforce Unit Testing.

title: Application development
description: Our Salesforce Developers help you deploy Salesforce applications by developing Visualforce pages and Lightning Web Components, as well as helping with release cycles.

title: Comprehensive knowledge of programming languages
description: Our certified resources have proficiency in Visualforce, Native, SOQL, and MySQL and deep knowledge of IDEs such as VS Code, Sublime, as well as APEX Data loader, and Force.com IDE.

title: QA and testing
description: Our developers have a strong understanding of performing/coordinating QA and testing in Salesforce and other applications.
